title: Lakers, Antonio Brown, OBJ, and the Cowboys
itunes:title: Lakers, Antonio Brown, OBJ, and the Cowboys
description:
Colin discusses why he feels LeBron James coming to the Los Angeles Lakers hasn't felt big, why teams should stay away from Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown and go after New York Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr., and the ups and downs of the Dallas Cowboys. Guests include Alex Rodriguez, Cuttino Mobley, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
